resources.string: Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow %s use the Storage and location permission
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow %s use the bluetooth and location permission
%1$s requires access to Storage and location permission. If the permissions are not on, %2$s cannot be used normally.
After that, %s could search and connect with the device
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow %s use the Location permission
%1$s requires access to Location permission. If the permissions are not on, %2$s cannot be used normally.
%1$s requires access to bluetooth scan contract and location permission. If the permissions are not on, %2$s cannot be used normally.
Are you sure you want to quit?
The password should be 8 characters.Please try again
Password do not match!Please try again.

* RSSI filtering is the highest priority filtering condition. BLE Name and MAC Address filtering must first meet the RSSI filtering condition.\n* There is an \"OR\" relationship between the BLE Name filtering and the MAC Address filtering.
